name: KOMPLEX
description:
Circular Breakout Bullet Hell action game in a retro vector graphics style.

Perfect game if you're looking for a little challenge!

FULLSCREEN recommended!

Instructions:

-Use the mouse to move the paddles

-Don't let the balls leave the screen or get the big paddle hit by projectiles

-Destroy blocks until the boss becomes vulnerable. Hit him 7 times to get to the next stage.

-Power-Ups

  • L: Extra Life
  • B: Activate Barriers
  • M: Multi-Ball
  • P: Bonus Points

PS: There's also an attached Windows build if you prefer playing locally. :)
